result.execSummary:
All charges against Brandan J. Cloud in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Brandan J. Cloud is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Brandan J. Cloud in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case dismissed without read-in.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 12, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Aaron Marcoux.  DEF in the Sawyer County Jail, but it is found to be unecessary for him to appear for this hearing.  OFF THE RECORD.
Atty Chapman requests more time for DE to complete STOP program.  Court does not approve- wants matters to proceed, as they are aging.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 12, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Warrant Card

Combined Cases (15CF271, 15CF123, 15CF14)    SPECIAL BOND Conditions with Random Testing
1. Defendant shall not consume any intoxicating beverages.
2. Defendant shall not enter the premises of any business that sells or serves alcoholic beverages by the drink.
EXCEPT that defendant may be on the premises of: 
for the purpose of employment, but only for the purpose of employment and only during his/her hours of employment.
3. Defendant shall be subject to RANDOM TESTING if his/her blood, breath or urine, and shall report to the Sawyer County Human Services Department at 10610 Main Street, Hayward, WI (ph. 715-638-3317) within 48 hours upon release from custody (not counting weekends and holidays) to schedule an intake session with the Sawyer County Traffic Offender Program (STOP) and to establish the procedures for the random testing. FAILURE TO REPORT TO STOP PROGRAM MAY RESULT IN THE ISSUANCE OF A WARRANT FOR THE DEFENDANT'S ARREST, MODIFICATION OF BAIL, POSSIBLE BAIL JUMPING CHARGES, AND/OR FORFEITURE OF BAIL.
Status conference on August 10, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: Co Signer:  Amber St Germaine

Defendant Brandan J. Cloud in court, in custody by video, with attorney Martin Jarvis making a special appearance as counsel.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of Complaint.  DEF states the correct spelling of his first name is "Brandan."   New Judge is to be assigned, as Judge Elect Yackel has a conflict, he has appeared in this matter as Assistant District Atty.   
DEF waives times limits for preliminary hearing.
Court orders $500 signature bond, with Amber St. Germaine as Co-signer on this bond.  She is responsible for making sure DEF makes his court appearances.  
Scheduling conference will be scheduled when new Judge is assigned to case.
